SourceString:
Fire chains in target direction. Deals <b>{AbilityDamage[Dmg1]}</> and pulls enemies and scrap towards you.
Enemies hit are Stunned for <b>{dataDmg.HitStunDuration}</> seconds.

<b>{Radius}m</> Radius. <b>{dataDmg.AngleTotal}°</> Angle.
Throw additional chains for a <b>{AngleMod}°</> wider Angle.
Chains can be used while Channeling
Instead fire the chains with your Ranged Weapon. Damage is 120% Weapon Damage instead. 50% Weapon Range.
Chains are fired in all directions. <b>{RadiusMod_UI}%</> less radius.

Reaches Stages every <b>{dataBase.ChargeTimePerStage}</> seconds as you Channel.\r\nGain <b>{dataBase.WeaponDmgMod_UI}%</> increased Weapon Damage per stage for <b>{dataActive.DurationTotal}</> seconds after the channeling ends.
